glsa.title: ngIRCd: Denial of service
glsa.synopsis: ngIRCd does not properly sanitize commands sent by users, allowing for a Denial of Service.

background.p: ngIRCd is a free open source daemon for Internet Relay Chat (IRC).

description.p: The IRC_PART() function in the file irc-channel.c does not properly check the number of parameters, referencing an invalid pointer if no channel is supplied.

impact.p: A remote attacker can exploit this vulnerability to crash the ngIRCd daemon.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.
